source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_00<tab>Something has Mogmont's pom-pom in a twist.

TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_01<tab>Mogmont's sense of duty has been highly offended by a brazen dragon who has built a nest just outside Zenith. The dutiful moogle bids you steal an egg from this nest, but does not say for what purpose. Go to the plaza in front of Zenith and take the egg from under the dragon's snout.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_01<tab>Mogmont vous a demandé d'aller voler l'œuf d'un dragon qui a fait son nid sur la place devant l'entrée de Zénith.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_02<tab>Understandably, the dragon attacks you when you attempt to steal the egg, but you manage to subdue it. Grab an egg from the nest before the dragon recovers.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez trouvé l'œuf, mais il était gardé par un dragon qui vous a attaqué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> dès que vous vous en êtes approché<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_03<tab>The egg is warm to the touch, and you can feel the heat of the soon-to-be-born dragon within. Bring the egg back to Mogmont to finally find out what he plans to do with it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez réussi à voler l'œuf. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à l'apporter à Mogmont.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_04<tab>After handing the dragon egg over to Mogmont, he reveals the final step in his master plan: he will return it. However, not before giving the thoughtless dragon an earful and lecturing him on the importance of keeping such a holy place as Zenith clean and tidy.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez donné l'œuf de dragon à Mogmont qui a alors décidé d'aller faire la morale aux disciples de Nidhogg et de le leur rendre à condition qu'ils promettent de respecter le Zénith si cher au grand dragon Hraesvelgr.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_000<tab>This aggression will not stand, kupo! Nidhogg's meddlesome minions have swarmed the plaza in front of Zenith.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_000<tab>La place devant l'entrée de Zénith est devenue un véritable repaire de disciples de Nidhogg. Ça ne peut pas continuer comme ça, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_001<tab>We need to do <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> to teach them a lesson. One of them even had the gall to make a nest right in front of the holy place, if you can believe that. I need you to snatch an egg from it─that'll teach them to breed where they don't belong!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_001<tab>L'un de ces dragons inconscients a même apparemment décidé de faire son nid sur ce lieu sacré<var 1D /var>! Quel culot<var 1D /var>! Allez donc lui voler son œuf pour lui donner une bonne leçon, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_010<tab>We cannot tolerate Nidhogg's dragons <var 1A 02 /var>breeding<var 1A 01 /var> on holy ground. Steal an egg from the nest to show those dragons they're not welcome here!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_010<tab>Allez voler l'œuf de ce dragon inconscient qui a décidé de faire son nid sur la place devant l'entrée de Zénith, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_030<tab>The nerve of that dragon, making a nest in such holy grounds. Did you have any trouble stealing the egg, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_030<tab>Avez-vous volé l'œuf de cet insolent dragon, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_031<tab>That... That egg is larger than I imagined! Oh? You want to know what I plan on doing with it?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_031<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qu'il est gros<var 1D /var>! Beau travail, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Et maintenant...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_032<tab>Why, I'm going to march right back to that dragon and give it back the egg! But not before giving it an earful! I'll have it know this is Hraesvelgr's domain, and we won't tolerate untidy nests around here, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ506_01841_MOGMONT_000_032<tab>Je vais aller le rendre aux disciples de Nidhogg, mais pas avant de leur avoir fait la morale et de leur faire promettre de respecter ce lieu sacré si cher au grand dragon Hraesvelgr, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
